survey_name: Remote Work Technology Tools Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction and efficiency with remote work technology tools provided by the company.

questions.question_text: Which remote work technology tools do you use regularly for work? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Video conferencing software (e.g., Zoom, Microsoft Teams)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Ensure 'Other' option includes a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an 'Other' option that allows open-text input.

script.question_text: Which remote work technology tools do you use regularly for work? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Video conferencing software (e.g., Zoom, Microsoft Teams)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the video conferencing software provided by the company?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if respondent selected 'Video conferencing software' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button scale for clarity.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the video conferencing software provided by the company?
script.routing_logic: Appears if respondent selected 'Video conferencing software' in Q1

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face when using collaboration tools? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if respondent selected 'Collaboration tools' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an 'Other' option that allows open-text input.
